page.title: 13* COMMENTS ON PAGES 11/12 *
page.content:
{COMPARISON OF MONTHS OF BAPTISM AND {BIRTH OF PAST AND PRESENT INHABITANTS { OF MANSTON. THE FIRST GRAPH ON PAGE 11 SHOWS HOW MANY PEOPLE WERE BAPTISED IN THE MONTHS BETWEEN THE YEARS 1847-59. IN THESE YEARS, AUGUST AND JANUARY WERE THE MOST POPULAR MONTHS FOR BIRTH. THIS WAS BECAUSE OF THE CHRISTMAS AND EASTER HOLIDAYS, WHEN NO-ONE WORKED AND THEY HAD TIME FOR OTHER ACTIVITIES. SEPTEMBER AND MAY ALSO HAD QUITE HIGH BIRTH RATES. BY LOOKING AT THE GRAPH ON PAGE 12 OF OUR SCHOOL MONTHS OF BIRTH WE CAN SEE THAT AUGUST STILL HAS THE HIGHEST BIRTH RATE, BUT SEPTEMBER IS JUST AS HIGH. DECEMBER HAS THE THIRD MOST BIRTHS. I WAS BORN IN MARCH.
{BY DARREN TURPIN AGED 12 OF ST. JAMES {SCHOOL, MANSTON.
